message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_SUBSCRIPTION_XRV_NOT_LEAD_USER_FOR_ORGUNIT
message.locale: The user must be the lead user of the organization unit or an administrator to perform this action.
The user must be the lead user of the organisation unit or an administrator to perform this action.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_SUBSCRIPTION_XRV_NOT_LEAD_USER_FOR_POSITION
message.locale: The user must be the lead user of the Position's organization unit or an administrator to perform this action.
The user must be the lead user of the Position's organisation unit or an administrator to perform this action.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_SUBSCRIPTION_XRV_NOT_LEAD_USER_FOR_JOB
message.locale: The user must be the lead user of the Job's organization unit or an administrator to perform this action.
The user must be the lead user of the Job's organisation unit or an administrator to perform this action.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_SUBSCRIPTION_XRV_NO_ADMIN_USER_EXISTS
message.locale: An administrator does not exist for this work queue.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_SUBSCRIPTION_XRV_ADDING_NOT_ADMIN_USER
message.locale: Only the administrator can add subscriptions to the work queue.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_SUBSCRIPTION_XRV_SENSITIVITY_CHECK
message.locale: You have a lower sensitivity than that of the work queue.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_SUBSCRIPTION_XRV_REMOVING_NOT_ADMIN_USER
message.locale: Only the administrator can remove subscriptions from the work queue.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_SUBSCRIPTION_XRV_USERSUBS_NOT_ALLOWED
message.locale: User cannot subscribe to this work queue.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_UNSUBSCRIBE_XRV_USERUNSUBS_NOT_ALLOWED
message.locale: User cannot unsubscribe from this work queue as the work queue administrator has set user subscription to false.

message.name: ERR_UNKNOWN_USER_SUBSCRIBED_TO_WORK_QUEUE
message.locale: User '%1s' cannot be subscribed to the work queue '%2s' because that user cannot be found on the system.

message.name: MSG_UNSUBSCRIBE_WORK_QUEUE_USER_PAGE_TITLE
message.locale: Unsubscribe User From Work Queue:

message.name: MSG_UNSUBSCRIBE_WORK_QUEUE_ORG_UNIT_PAGE_TITLE
message.locale: Unsubscribe Organization Unit From Work Queue:
Unsubscribe Organisation Unit From Work Queue:

message.name: MSG_UNSUBSCRIBE_WORK_QUEUE_POSITION_PAGE_TITLE
message.locale: Unsubscribe Position From Work Queue:

message.name: MSG_UNSUBSCRIBE_WORK_QUEUE_JOB_PAGE_TITLE
message.locale: Unsubscribe Job From Work Queue:

message.name: MSG_UNSUBSCRIBE_WORK_QUEUE_USER_PAGE_TEXT_SUP
message.locale: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe the user from this work queue?

message.name: MSG_UNSUBSCRIBE_WORK_QUEUE_ORG_UNIT_PAGE_TEXT_SUP
message.locale: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe the organization unit from this work queue?
Are you sure you want to unsubscribe the organisation unit from this work queue?

message.name: MSG_UNSUBSCRIBE_WORK_QUEUE_POSITION_PAGE_TEXT_SUP
message.locale: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe the position from this work queue?

message.name: MSG_UNSUBSCRIBE_WORK_QUEUE_JOB_PAGE_TEXT_SUP
message.locale: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe the job from this work queue?

message.name: MSG_UNSUBSCRIBE_WORK_QUEUE_USER_PAGE_TEXT_ADMIN
message.locale: Are you sure you want to remove this user's subscription to the work queue?

message.name: MSG_UNSUBSCRIBE_WORK_QUEUE_ORG_UNIT_PAGE_TEXT_ADMIN
message.locale: Are you sure you want to remove this organization unit's subscription to the work queue?
Are you sure you want to remove this organisation unit's subscription to the work queue?

message.name: MSG_UNSUBSCRIBE_WORK_QUEUE_POSITION_PAGE_TEXT_ADMIN
message.locale: Are you sure you want to remove this Position's subscription to the work queue?

message.name: MSG_UNSUBSCRIBE_WORK_QUEUE_JOB_PAGE_TEXT_ADMIN
message.locale: Are you sure you want to remove this Job's subscription to the work queue?

message.name: ERR_WORKQUEUE_SUBSCRIPTION_XRV_NOT_ALLOWED
message.locale: This work queue cannot be subscribed currently.
